name: buy_raffle_ticket
attributes: # [doc = " ラッフルチケットを購入し、売上金をプールに積み上げるが、"]
# [doc = " raffle_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let raffle = & mut ctx . accounts . raffle_account ;
let ticket = & mut ctx . accounts . ticket_account ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= price ;
* * ctx . accounts . prize_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += price ;
raffle . tickets_sold = raffle . tickets_sold . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
ticket . tickets = ticket . tickets . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: raffle_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して照合チェックを行うべき"]

fields.name: ticket_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して照合チェックを行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " チケット購入者（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: prize_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 賞金プール（Lamports 保管先）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このラッフルを管理するユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: ticket_price
fields.attribute: # [doc = " チケット1枚あたりの価格（Lamports）"]

fields.name: tickets_sold
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに販売したチケット数"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このチケット口座を所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: tickets
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーが保有するチケット枚数"]
